channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report X-2023070446
item.description:
Report X-2023070446

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-05
  • City: MONROE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: TAPE BROKE AND WAS DISCOVERED THAT A FLAMMABLE LIQUID WAS SHIPPED WITHOUT BEING PROPERLY DECLARED, DID NOT LEAK. RESPONDER CONFIRMED UNDECLARED WITH HMSC.
